superPromo.title: School Marathon
superPromo.subtitle: Dress up the little ones for the first bell celebration

description.text: Ukraine's largest online marketplace for selling and buying goods!

banner.title: We are Yom
banner.description: Our site's goal is to make online trading as accessible and simple as possible for every user. We strive to create a platform where you can easily place your ads and find the best offers for goods and services in your city. Our goal is to provide you with a convenient and efficient tool for purchases and sales so you can find everything you need and make deals with ease. Your comfort and satisfaction from using our website is our highest goal.

bottom.text: We are a young and ambitious team
bottom.description: Our experienced team develops the best programs for users for convenience and efficiency.

description.text1: How to increase your sales and save on advertising?
description.text2: Get free articles and materials from our partners. It's a valuable resource for those who wish to grow their business and stay updated with the latest trends.

buy_plans_main_section.title: Paid Services Package
buy_plans_main_section.description: Customize the placement of your ads to fit your needs

advantages.text5: Maximum Coverage in Ukraine on the Largest Platform

description.text2: Learn about our updated advertising placement rules that make the advertising campaign even more effective.

description1.text1: Placement of a banner on your homepage or main website page.
description1.text2: Placement of a banner on one of the sectional pages (of your choice).
description1.text4: Reports on website visits and banner click-through rate.
description1.text5: Opportunity to change the banner once a month without an additional fee.

description2.text1: Placement of a banner on a greater number of sectional pages (2 of your choice).
description2.text2: Priority banner placement above banners of other users on selected pages.
description2.text5: Opportunity to change the banner twice a month without an additional fee.

description3.text1: All the advantages of the "Standard" and "Professional" tariffs.
description3.text2: Exclusive banner placement on the homepage.
description3.text3: Access to the site's email list audience for advertising.
description3.text5: Opportunity to change the banner three times a month without an additional fee.

steps.text1: Determine the size of the banner you need (e.g., 580X340 pixels). Take a closer look at the right panel of the site, where examples of our site's advertising banners are presented. Choose colors that match your brand and your website design.
steps.text2: Choose or create an image that matches your banner's message. Come up with a selling text using your branding styles. Do not post false information! Use high-quality photos for a better visual impression.
steps.text3: Place the image and text on the banner, creating a harmonious composition. Do not use more than 2 fonts. Use more space for important content that you want to be seen first.
steps.text4: Check if your banner has the correct web resolution (usually 72 dpi). Save your banner in JPG or PNG format.

text.title: If the advertisement is ready
text.description: Please fill out the form to place your advertisement. Fields marked with * are mandatory.

description.text2: We will not only help you create an attractive advertising banner, but also advise which tariff is best for your business.
